WELCOME TO PRECISION

Corona's Choice in Auto Repair

Whether you drive a Ford or a Jaguar, you deserve the best auto service in the county. Precision import Auto Repair is the leading auto shop for domestic and imported vehicles in Corona. More over, all of Riverside County comes to us for our top-quality auto repair and maintenance services. if your check engine light is on or you're just due for an oil change, we are the shop for you.

Precision Import Auto Repair is a family owned and operated shop staffed with ASE certified technicians. We offer expert repair with quality customer service that can't be beat. We are also an official California smog check facility, helping keep your older vehicles ready for the road. Our expertise in auto repair makes sure that every vehicle runs smoothly by the time it leaves our shop.

CAR PROBLEMS?

Visit Our Auto Repair Shop in Corona

Our specialty may be European imports, but there is no problem we can't fix for domestic and Asian brands as well. Precision Import Auto Repair operates a state-of-the-art facility that can serve any make and model you drive.

Our auto repair shop is one of the leaders in the car repair industry because we have the tools and the skills to make your car run like new. We take the time in every auto repair service to comprehensively understand the problem.

From there, we can do it all: simple brake repairs, suspension work, starter and alternator replacement, auto electric checks, cooling system repair, and much more. While we may take the time to get to the root of the problem, we complete our repairs and maintenance within a fast turnaround time. For domestic,Asian andEuropean auto repair, Precision Import Auto Repair is the best auto repair shop in the county. Drive in today for emergency assistance or call us now to schedule a repair instead.
